room_title: Escape room "Zen Temple" by Xscape Quest in Michigan City
room_address: 301 W US Highway 20, Michigan City, IN 46360
room_description:
Welcome to the Zen temple. Here you will commence on your quest to achieve enlightenment. A spiritual awakening can be obtained by first seeking inner peace through meditation. As you transcend over the restrictive aspects of a modern world, a spiritual emergence will shift your energy into multiple chakras.
Ancient cultures believe that the human body is made up of seven different types of energy centers called chakras. To achieve true enlightenment, one must perfectly balance all seven chakras within themselves. Your spiritual ascension begins here at the Zen temple.
